TooltipItem.name: wBlynkCursorHelp
TooltipItem.value: Choose how often you would like to be prompted to blink, a healthy blink rate is roughly every 6 seconds.

TooltipItem.name: wBlynkCursorRandomHelp
TooltipItem.value: If you prefer less regular blink prompts select Random and choose how many times a minute you would like to blink. 10 times a minute is a healthy, normal blink rate.

TooltipItem.name: wScreenBreakHelp
TooltipItem.value: It is very important to remember to take breaks from your screen, not just for your eyes but for your whole body. Optometrists recommend looking away from your screen for 20 seconds every 20 minutes and so do we.

TooltipItem.name: wScreenBreakStrengthHelp
TooltipItem.value: Choose how light or dark your Screen Break prompt will be when it appears in the middle of your screen.

TooltipItem.name: wBlueLightReducerHelp
TooltipItem.value: The blue light given off from your screen has negative effects on sleep patterns and can also cause both short term and long term damage to your eyes.

TooltipItem.name: wBlueLightReducerStartTimeHelp
TooltipItem.value: Blue light is most damaging before you go to sleep as it affects the sleep hormone melatonin. This feature allows you to activate the Blue Light Reducer around the time you go to bed, we recommend activating at least 3 hours before going to sleep.
